EmailTemplate.name: Global English - NatGeo Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: Your National Geographic Request is Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} :
Your request for using the National Geographic image / video has been approved. Please be aware that this approval is limited only to the one-time use specifically described in your request. You will receive a link to download the image/ video you requested.
{!Lead.Description}
Amy J. Hurff DuPont Corporate Communications Brand Specialist 302-996-8361 amy.j.hurff@dupont.com
